channel.title: Making a client for my server
channel.description:
Hi, I've made a wikd server, and i was wondering how do i make a client for it, like one where i have my own background image, my own login text and the server IP and port automatically done.
Thanks in advance!
PS Please don't flame me for being a noob or an idiot or anything lol, i am learning java atm...i am as far as memorizing the HelloWorldApp tutorial rofl!

item.title: Making a client for my server
item.dc:creator: @WonderDude WonderDude
